website_summaries.verdict: Sunbutter is great for the purists out there; it just has one ingredient.
pros: All that's in this butter is roasted sunflower seed
No extra sweetening, no extra salt
This means the texture is creamy and smooth, and it's a good choice for anyone on a diet or cutting back on sweets
cons: Probably won't be popular with kids and may lack flavor for some adults

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I am allergic to almonds and was looking for an alternative to peanut butter to add as a staple to my pantry. I was pleasantly surprised by its flavor! I do eat sunflower seeds but have never tasted its butter, so I didn't know what to expect. It does not taste exactly like peanut butter but is very close in taste, and consistency. It is also very filling. I am on the Keto diet and wanted to mix it up a bit and have more choices for breakfast other than eggs. I believe this butter with a little home-made Low Carb Chia Seed Cherry or Strawberry Jam slathered on a low carb slice of bread would be delicious!
customer_reviews.author: SafaaTilal

customer_reviews.title: Terrible tasting, not satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter refused to eat this because it tasted so bad. I thought she was over reacting, but she was not. We've purchased the non-organic type of sunButter before and it was delicious., so I'm not sure if its the switch from regular to organic - which it totally shouldn't make a difference. I only ordered the organic because it was prime and the regular type was not available. I figured organic should taste even better. I was very disappointed. I saw someone else have a comment about the bad taste, so i'm not sure if it was a bad batch, but, i wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Yumm.
customer_reviews.text: I saw a recipe called "Sun Butter Fat Bombs" that I wanted to try, because I wanted to try something new and low carb. This Sunflower seed butter and cacao are the main ingredients with flavor, and I really liked it. I made the recipe twice in one week. The Sunbutter by itself is soft, easy to spread and tasty if I decide to lick the spoon. It didn't separate into hard and oily layers. I have to keep it away from the kids due to the cost (guilty feelings about that) but I will order it again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Paul in Hillsdale

customer_reviews.title: Good peanut butter replacement
customer_reviews.text: I found out later in life that I was allergic to peanuts and, I grew to miss peanut butter on crackers, PBJs, etc. I have tried a variety of nut butters consistent with my allergies, and I have found SunButter to be the closest replacement to actual peanut butter. I have tried other brands, and this is the best sunflower seed butter I have used. My only complaints are that the oil and base tend to separate creating inconsistency in the thickness and the ability to spread the product is negatively impacted. Overall, I will be using this as my primary peanut butter replacement for the foreseeable future.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Love that its allergen free!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that Sun Butter is still selling this allergen free sunflower butter. I hope they keep this soy-free type, along with also avoiding cross contamination with gluten, milk, eggs, fish etc. Apart from making sun-butter myself, this is the only sun-butter I have found I can tolerate due to my extensive food sensitivities. I love the taste, and often enjoy it on sliced apple or on a stalk of celery or a rice cake. It really hits the spot as an excellent snack. It is also something I can easily take with me in an emergency situation to a location where I otherwise would have very little to nothing I could eat.
customer_reviews.author: Bea G.

customer_reviews.title: and it is the worst I've ever tasted
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Sun Nut Butter for years. This is the first time I've ordered from here, and it is the worst I've ever tasted. Something is not right here.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and healthy
customer_reviews.text: The product is available as pure sunflower seed or as one with added sugar and salt. I like both. Makes a great sandwich. After Costco dropped Sun Butter I made a big mistake and bought David from Conagra. David is heavily salted unshelled sunflower seeds. The seeds are tiny and it would take all day to get enough to keep you alive. Be very grateful that Sun Butter does the job for you. A final word for the programmer who wrote this editor program for Amazom. I hope he has a quick trip to hell.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Creamy, yet free of all ingredients but sunflower seeds. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Julez

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff! It took a minute to get used to, as it does not have any sugar, but that is why I bought it in the first place. My husband and I were doing a program that prohibits sugar and we grew to absolutely love the taste of this SunButter. We even continued to buy this product after our program was over. It's pricey, but even my husband loves the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: MDizzle

customer_reviews.title: I love this nut butter!
customer_reviews.text: Allergic to peanuts, have no problem with sunflower. Doesn't have exactly the same taste as peanut butter, but is very tasty on organic 'Ritz' style round crackers so I don't even miss the peanut taste. Also works for making delicious peanut blossom cookies with the kisses in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Didn't taste as good as I thought it would taste
customer_reviews.text: Didn't taste as good as I thought it would taste, and not because of quality, but probably just because of the product itself, and me not being used to no taste. I was expected a much nuttier taste like peanut butter, but these are seeds, so again, it has nothing to do with the product itself. I would recommend to persons who like this kind of thing to eat :)
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Lackey

customer_reviews.title: Product had leaked
customer_reviews.text: Upon receipt, the lid was askew, outside of jar was all oily and messy. Had difficulty opening and when it was finally opened, the seal was open. Half of the top of the jar was exposed. Hard to imagine how that could’ve happened by accident! Needless to say, I won’t be feeding this product to my family. Should I send it back?
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: If I didn't like the flavor of this Sun Butter
customer_reviews.text: Used this product to make hemp protein balls. I mention this because the recipe calls for a lot of this product. If I didn't like the flavor of this Sun Butter, I wouldn't like end result. It has great flavor! Stores well.
customer_reviews.author: Tamra Tammen

customer_reviews.title: Nutritional & tasteful- Organic to top it off
customer_reviews.text: With all the fake organic foods being sold; hopefully this is truly organic. It’s great tasting, nutritional butter. Put it on organic bread toast with some organic honey & it’s nice sandwich for the trail.
customer_reviews.author: HVA

customer_reviews.title: Sunflower seed butter is very healthy!
customer_reviews.text: Sunflower seed butter is better for health reasons than peanut butter. The taste is also better. This is a great quality sunflower seed butter.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Pierotti

customer_reviews.title: Tastes gross
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy the regular sunflower butter, but thought I would try organic for something healthier. However, the taste is awful! If you're going to buy this brand of sunflower butter, stick with the original. The original tastes the best, just like sunflower kernels.
customer_reviews.author: A. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: This version is gross.  Do yourself a favor and just buy the natural one.  It tastes a way better.
customer_reviews.text: This was gross. I regret buying it. I would give it no stars if I could. It is not sweetened and is very oily. The regular natural version tastes a thousand times better. Do yourself a favor and just buy the natural one.
customer_reviews.author: Cats are the best!

customer_reviews.title: No sugar!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time buying sunbutter. It literally tastes like sunflower seeds, so there is no complaint from me on that. I was not impressed with the price, since I can get it for half that at the store. However, I was glad that I found some without sugar which can be hard to do.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Bierling

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product in my smoothies and occasionally on a piece of toast. Really yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is organic and has no sugar and low sodium. Exactly what I needed for my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: A tasty alternative to peanut butter! Smooth spreading even just out of the fridge, not oily (unless you let it sit out for weeks), affordable. Did I mention a tasty alternative to aflatoxin laden peanut butter?
customer_reviews.author: SaltCitySteve

customer_reviews.title: Yuck...tastes burnt
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why but this tasted burnt. I've eaten sunflower butter lots of times and it never tasted yuck like this. I contacted the company but since I bought it from Amazon they told me to bring it up with them. This is not eligible for a return. I will be contacting Amazon C/S but in the meantime would not advise ordering this here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! Addictive! It’s a must have! Love it in smoothies!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Good smooth consistency, maybe a tad thinner than PB. Great taste, tastes surprisingly not much like sunflower seeds but in a good way. Good with carrots, apples, in sandwiches and when you eat it with other stuff you can't really distinguish it from PB.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Matana Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and nut free!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best if you are allergic to nuts, it’s great regardless!
customer_reviews.author: filmbuff?

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Taste like crap Over priced Local store had the same brand and oz container for half the price
customer_reviews.author: JWheelz

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like the taste!
customer_reviews.text: Yuck! Oh I did not like this! Maybe it was the pregnancy talking....won’t try it again post part un to find out though.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Bitter
customer_reviews.text: A lot of separation of oil and the actual butter and needed lots of stirring. Nice mouth feel but bitter end taste is weird after peanut butter !!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas J.

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like unsalted.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the flavor of this peanut butter substitute & believe it is because it is unsalted. When I use it, I either need to drown it in jam or dust it with salt. I prefer the Trader Joe’s version because it is salted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mmmm.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the flavor. I only wish it were in a glass jar rather than plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Grainne

customer_reviews.title: The product has a great taste and can be used in several ways.
customer_reviews.text: I use it on toast with jelly, make smoothies, and with celery sticks. I plan to use it in a cookie recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Mel G.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious! My favorite low sugar fix!
customer_reviews.text: I love....not only the taste but the nutrition facts. Low sugar, low carbs and organic! I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Seymour

customer_reviews.title: A taste to get use to.
customer_reviews.text: All I can have at this time. PB is allowed in January. This will do for now!
customer_reviews.author: Betty Toser

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best....
customer_reviews.text: This is all natural and it will delight your taste buds !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Hardman

customer_reviews.title: satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but i'm satisfied with the product. I'll buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Don Shipman

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, and is healthy
customer_reviews.text: Not as sweet as most, but tastes good, and is healthy
customer_reviews.author: KIMBER BLACK

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and, of course, super healthy. First found on Amazon, latest purchases have been through WalMart for a good $7 savings.
customer_reviews.author: BradHip

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is so good. Much creamier and easier to spread than peanut ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so good. Much creamier and easier to spread than peanut butter. Supposed to be better for you also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely dissatisfied ~Terrible Taste and Texture
customer_reviews.text: If I could, I would give it less than one star. I was hopeful that it would have a pleasant flavor, but was completely dissatisfied. It has a terrible taste and left a coating like feeling in my mouth. What is also unfortunate, is that it is not returnable!! Sorry to say, it was GROSS tasting! (as my 16 year old son also confirmed!)
customer_reviews.author: Donna newhart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sunbutter. Exactly what I was wanting and needing ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sunbutter. Exactly what I was wanting and needing for my specific diet. I have since found it cheaper at my local store so I noe buy it there.
customer_reviews.author: Bouncin

customer_reviews.title: Smooth texture, similar to peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. Very similar to regular peanut butter. Smooth and creamy texture. Recommended as easier to digest. Will buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Inedible
customer_reviews.text: Tastes rancid—maybe it’s just a bad batch because the expiration is 2021. It was so weird and unpalatable. Other reviewers liked it so I am guessing I just got a jar from a rotten batch. YUK!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Some of the best sunbutter that I have come across.
customer_reviews.author: Sweets Underwood

customer_reviews.title: SunButter is YumButter!
customer_reviews.text: SunButter Organic Sunflower Seed Spread, where have you been all my life?! YUM! Gave up peanuts and have been missing peanut butter. This is so very much better! Nice roasted flavor and smooth consistency, already placed another order.
customer_reviews.author: psalmlady

customer_reviews.title: Love the organic SunButterbecause it doesn't contain any sugar - ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the organic SunButterbecause it doesn't contain any sugar - wish it was salted though. But I can always add sea salt!
customer_reviews.author: Hoelz

customer_reviews.title: Poor Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a substitute for peanut butter. This flavor is weird. not appetizing.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and greattaste
customer_reviews.text: Great taste a Nd easy way to add protein to diet
customer_reviews.author: Marlys Knepper

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my son, who is alergic to ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son, who is alergic to just about everything and he loves it. Thank goodness since it's so hard to find food he can eat.
customer_reviews.author: Musicbird

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Im enjoying so far as a spoon full treat,but am planning on using in receipes
customer_reviews.author: priceless

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t taste good
customer_reviews.text: This stuff doesn’t taste very good. Quite an unappealing flavor.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this SunButter. I liked it so much I bought a 6 pack haha.. I'll be getting more when I run out as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hamza

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tastes gross to me, but my husband likes it. It's worth it if you are allergic to peanuts.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Monroe

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy the cashew butter more
customer_reviews.text: Taste is just fair. I enjoy the cashew butter more.
customer_reviews.author: Enjoy Good Music

customer_reviews.title: great taste and quality
customer_reviews.text: I make sunbread with it, good taste and easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: FireLake

customer_reviews.title: Product seal was damaged
customer_reviews.text: Never got to try this product as the protective seal was damaged. Had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes yummy
customer_reviews.text: My son & I both like this seed butter. It tastes yummy!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Jean

customer_reviews.title: It's so good!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sunflower butter with no sugar. This one tastes great. it has salt, but I'm okay with that.
customer_reviews.author: Diana H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for allergy sensitive schools! My daughter doesn’t even realize the difference from regular peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Janes

customer_reviews.title: Very addictive!
customer_reviews.text: The most delisious butter! Can't live without it! You buy it once and you will never look back.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: YUM!
customer_reviews.text: This SunButter is Amazing!! I can't have peanuts anymore, and hated almonds butter, but then I found this! It's perfect, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great substitute for peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: Now my toddler can have “peanut butter” sandwiches at his peanut free school.
customer_reviews.author: FLmom3

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Prefer the taste of their Creamy style ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Prefer the taste of their Creamy style better. But liked the assurance of it being organic. It was easy to spread.
customer_reviews.author: LSHR

customer_reviews.title: This is UNSALTED
customer_reviews.text: Needs salt to taste good. Not sure why they didn’t put salt in this.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro “Dro” “The Gawd” Correa

customer_reviews.title: Get Yourself Some
customer_reviews.text: Perfect substitute for peanut butter in paleo cooking. Love this in my chocolate chip cookie recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Mason

customer_reviews.title: and I love it! So Delicious
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've tried sunbutter, and I love it! So Delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca J. Fost

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't have sugar added so I like that a lot
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find this kind at the grocery store. It doesn't have sugar added so I like that a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little oily, the taste was a little heavier than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: S. McG

customer_reviews.title: Nope, nope, nope....
customer_reviews.text: I had a small sample of this in a lunch kit and thought it was pretty good. Got a jar of the stuff and the consistency is sooo wrong, spread like a honey and did not hold any shape, kind of oily. Had almost no taste at first, just a lingering of burnt sunflower seeds after a few seconds, even after stirring the jar contents. I do not need a peanut butter replacement bad enough to eat this. Thanks for trying SunButter!
customer_reviews.author: Darolyn

customer_reviews.title: Taste is horrible
customer_reviews.text: Tastes horrible. My son hates it. Nothing like peanut butter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't say zero sugar, but it's not sweet at all
customer_reviews.text: Kind of like pasted sunflower seeds. I'll still eat it, but sheesh! They should say it on the label at this price...
customer_reviews.author: Khosmo2
